subject: Fortune Preserver Amidst Everlasting Cold
content:
"Gather herbs in the morning. Make medicine in the afternoon. Do light stretches in the evening." — The daily schedule written in Qiqi's notebook.



♦ Pharmacist, Bubu Pharmacy

♦ Vision: Cryo

♦ Constellation: Pristina Nola




An apprentice and herb gatherer at Bubu Pharmacy, Qiqi is an undead with a bone-white complexion.


She seldom has much in the way of words or emotions.


"Blessed" by the adepti with a body that cannot die, this petite zombie retains her original appearance as a child. Who knows how old she really is...


Zombies must have orders before they can do anything. Somehow Qiqi ended up responsible for giving orders to herself.


Qiqi's memory is like a sieve. Out of necessity, she always carries around a notebook.


Despite how problematic her memory may be, she is actually quite well-equipped to get through the day: she can use orders to force herself to complete tasks; if she forgets anything, she can look at her notebook for a reminder; and if any task proves difficult, her incredible strength can help solve many problems.


Recently, she has also added a section on "brain training" and "mnemonic methods." Her notebook is a becoming a true "dummy's guide" on just about anything.


But on her worst days, she even forgets to look at her notebook...


If while in the mountains of Liyue you see someone bumping into things, walking in circles, or chasing squirrels that don't exist, it is almost certainly to be the adorable undead herb gatherer. If she seems to be struggling, please lend a helping hand!


"I am Qiqi. I am a zombie. And I forgot what comes next."


An apprentice and herb gatherer at Bubu Pharmacy.


"Blessed" by the adepti with a body that cannot die, this petite zombie cannot do anything without first giving herself orders to do it.


Qiqi's memory is like a sieve. Out of necessity, she always carries around a notebook in which she writes anything important that she is sure to forget later.


But on her worst days, she even forgets to look at her notebook...


>>> Learn More about Qiqi <<<

subject: PlayStation®4 FAQ
content:
Dear Travelers,

If you still have any questions as you prepare to start your adventure on PlayStation®4, please have a look at the following FAQ — it contains helpful information for your journey!



Will Genshin Impact be free-to-play on the PlayStation 4? When will the game be playable?

Genshin Impact is a free-to-play game. For further details regarding the game's pre-load and release schedule, please see below:


Pre-load start time (pre-orders only): 9/26/2020 12:00 AM (UTC+8)

Pre-order end time: 9/28/2020 12:00 AM (UTC+8)

Pre-load start time (free): 9/28/2020, 12:00 AM (UTC+8)

Official release time: 9/28/2020 10:00 AM (UTC+8)



What is the Adventurer's Starter Bundle?

The Adventurer's Starter Bundle is an exclusive pre-order bundle for the PlayStation 4 version of Genshin Impact. The bundle can be pre-ordered now via the PlayStation Store, and will be available until 9/28/2020 12:00 AM (UTC+8). Travelers who purchase the Adventurer's Starter Bundle will be able to begin pre-loading the game onto their PS4 consoles via the PlayStation Store page starting 9/26/2020 12:00 AM (UTC+8). Having the game pre-loaded beforehand will allow Travelers to step into the world of Teyvat the moment the game comes online.



Which languages will be supported in the PS4 version of Genshin Impact?

The following subtitle languages will be supported in the PS4 version of Genshin Impact: English, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, German, French, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese, Thai, Indonesian, and Vietnamese. The game will also include voice-overs in the following languages: English, Japanese, Korean, and Chinese. Travelers will be able to select from the above subtitle and voiceover languages regardless of the regional store from which the game has been downloaded.



Will my character data from the PS4 version also be available to play on the mobile and PC versions of Genshin Impact?

In terms of data, Travelers' PS4 character data will not be accessible on other platforms, as PlayStation Network (PSN) accounts are not accessible on other platforms. In terms of gameplay, however, PS4 players will be able to play together with friends on other platforms via crossplay within the same game server, and will be able to participate together in co-op events.



How do I determine which game server my PSN account is associated with?

Due to restrictions, you may be unable to switch your PSN account's region. To ensure that you will be able to play co-op mode with your friends, please confirm your PSN account's region settings.


America Server - North America, Central America, and South America

Europe Server - Europe, Africa, and Middle East

Asia Server - Asia (except Mainland China) and Oceania


This information is based on Sony's regional standards. Please check the regions listed carefully for details regarding your area. If you have any further questions regarding regional compatibility for the PS4, please contact PlayStation support directly (https://support.playstation.com/).




How do I play co-op mode together with my friends?

In order to play co-op mode together with friends, both you and your friends must select the same game server, progress to Adventure Rank 16, and must complete the required quests to unlock co-op mode. Please refer to FAQ question 5 for more information regarding regions and servers.



Is PlayStation Plus required to play co-op mode online with my friends?

PlayStation Plus is not required to play co-op mode online with friends.



Will the PS4 version of Genshin Impact be an offline game or an online game?

Genshin Impact requires an internet connection in order to play.



Which PS4 models can play Genshin Impact?

Genshin Impact can be played on the original PlayStation 4, the PlayStation 4 Slim, and the PlayStation 4 Pro. Please ensure that you have more than 30 GB of available storage space on your PS4 console to download and play Genshin Impact. Information regarding subsequent game updates will always be promptly announced via our official community channels.



Will the PS4 version of Genshin Impact support the trophy system?

Yes, the PS4 version of Genshin Impact will include trophies.



Will the PS4 version of Genshin Impact have downloadable content (DLC)?

Genshin Impact will have subsequent version updates that will add new playable game content. Travelers will be able to update the game for free.



What are the exclusive PS4 version rewards and how do I collect them?

Once Travelers complete the tutorial quests on the PS4, they will receive the exclusive Sword of Descension and Wings of Descension via in-game mail.



Why should I pre-register for the PS4 version of Genshin Impact?

Travelers that pre-register for the PS4 version of the game can receive the latest news regarding Genshin Impact and will be able to enter the world of Teyvat the moment the game comes online. Also, Travelers that pre-register will be able to participate in the pre-registration milestone events to receive rewards once the game is released. So what are you waiting for? Head over to Genshin Impact's PS4 pre-registration page and sign-up now!



Why does the purchase price of a particular item appear differently on other platforms?

Due to differences in platforms policies and regional tax rates, there may be differences in the pricing shown for particular items across various regions.

subject: The shining stars above have long decided the fate of all.
content:
"Astrologist Mona Megistus's essays are truly fascinating. Not that I really get it, but it's super interesting nonetheless." — Ziwei, a long-time reader of The Steambird.



◆  Enigmatic Astrologer

◆  Vision: Hydro

◆  Constellation: Astrolabos



Mona is unique among astrologers — others may speak with great ostentation for money, but Mona has never done so. Nor does she dress up or mince her words, even if her results are unpleasant to hear: "You won't amount to anything even if you join the Adventurers' Guild." "You've got no chance with him. In fact, he will soon leave you" — such is the nature of her rejoinders.


Her blunt nature has resulted in plummeting numbers of people coming to have their fortunes told. But Mona isn't one to complain, for that just leaves her with more time for her personal research.


But when one speaks of research, one also speaks of the necessity of purchasing texts and research apparatus. Mona's only income comes from her contributions to The Steambird's "All Things Astrological" column. Every paycheck is spent first on her research. Books from Liyue, an astrolabe from Sumeru... all of these come with a hefty price tag, and by the time Mona regains her senses, there's only enough of her income left for her to scrape by each month.


"It matters not. Astrologers must rid themselves of material desires. Only by ridding oneself of clutter can one see the true world around them." So says Mona, coughing loudly all the while to cover the sound of her growling stomach.


Today, too, is another day Mona worries about Mora.


>>> Learn More about Mona <<<

subject: With the Force of Thunder Comes the Star of Change
content:
"Rex Lapis has watched over Liyue for a millennium. But what about the next millennium? What about the next ten, or the next hundred millennia? How long are we expecting this status quo to last?"


On hearing these words, Rex Lapis burst into hearty laughter.



◆  Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing

◆  Vision: Electro

◆  Constellation: Trulla Cementarii



The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis' unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue ⁠— but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.


One of the Liyue Qixing, Keqing has an uncompromising belief in actions over words. If she sees something that needs doing, she'll do it herself. For example, she traveled around Liyue and carefully memorized each detail of the land so that she may one day be able to maximize the utility of every last inch of Liyue.


Keqing deals with the day-to-day affairs of Liyue, whether great or small, while Rex Lapis only descends once a year.


To many, the millennia of prosperity that Liyue has enjoyed serve to legitimize Rex Lapis' guidance of the city. But Keqing has her reservations about all this, viewing Liyue's present prosperity as akin to a magnificent sandcastle on the beach — humanity does not have the luxury of deciding when the tide will come in.


Rex Lapis has watched over Liyue for a millennium. But what about the next millennium? What about the next ten, or the next hundred millennia? How long are we expecting this status quo to last?


It is this unanswered question that drives Keqing to work relentlessly and remain diligent.


From most people's perspective, there is no point in working oneself up like this. But Keqing cannot sit by idly and ignore this hidden danger.


The people of Liyue have never considered navigating the future on their own terms. But someone must walk on the front line of the epoch and forge a new path with their own hands.


From most people's perspective, there is no point in working oneself up like this. But Keqing cannot sit by idly and ignore this hidden danger.



>>> Learn More about Keqing <<<

subject: Genshin Impact Frequently Asked Questions Summary (PC Version)
content:
Dear Travelers,


On September 26 10:00 (UTC+8), Travelers on PC can pre-download the Genshin Impact game client from our official website. To that end, we have collected some of your questions to be answered below, so please take note of them!



Device Compatibility


Q1: What are the recommended specifications for PC?

A1:

Recommended Specifications:

Operating Systems: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit, Windows 8.1 64-bit, or  Windows 10 64-bit (Windows 10 dev builds are not currently supported)

Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent

RAM: 16 GB

Graphics Card: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 6GB or better

DirectX Version: 11

Storage Space: 30 GB of available storage space

Minimum Specifications:

Operating Systems: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit, Windows 8.1 64-bit, or Windows  10 64-bit (Windows 10 dev builds are not currently supported)

Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent

RAM: 8 GB

Graphics Card: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 1030 or better

DirectX Version: 11

Storage Space: 30 GB of available storage space



Common Installation Questions


Q1: When I open the launcher or launch the game, I get the following  error: "The version of this file is not compatible with the version of Windows you're running."

A1: Please confirm that your Windows operating system fulfills the system  compatibility requirements. If your specifications are too low, you may be  unable to install or launch the game. You may also experience black screens  and unresponsiveness.

PS: If you are using Windows 7, you must at least be running the Windows  7 Service Pack 1 version to play the game.


Q2: After opening the launcher, the launcher's main menu displays  incorrectly. (e.g. the launcher page does not display fully)

A2: Right click Genshin's desktop icon and select  "Compatibility" > "Change High DPI Settings", and tick  "Replace high DPI scaling behavior", select "System"  below, and after applying your settings, restart the launcher to restore  normal display function.


Q3: While downloading, I get the following message: "Please check  your network connection."

A3: Please click to restart your download. If the error persists, please  check your network connection and VPN settings.


Q4: After opening the game, the game does not respond/the game does not  launch.

A4: Please check if you have an anti-virus program installed, and check  if this program is blocking any files related to Genshin Impact's  installation. If it is, please remove said blockage, set the relevant files  to "trusted," or close the anti-virus software before re-opening  the game.


Q5: After launching the game, the game is stuck on a white screen before  the Genshin Impact logo can appear.

A5: Please check if a folder named "DXSETUP"exists within your  installation directory. If so, please double-click on the  "DXSETUP.exe" executable within the folder to manually install  DirectX 11 before restarting the game. If not please download and install  DirectX 11.


Q6: When launching the game, the following error message appears:  "Failed to download resource files or network error. Please try again.  Code: -9908"

A6: Please try re-launching the game. If this does not work, please  uninstall the launcher, delete the game installation package, and reinstall Genshin Impact.


Q7: When I update the game, I get the following message:  "Insufficient space on disk."

A7: Please ensure that the hard disk to which you have installed the game  has enough space. If the space remaining does not exceed 30 GB, we recommend  that you delete some files before re-opening the launcher and updating the  game once again.


Q8: I have yet to uninstall previous beta test files. Can I directly install the official release version of Genshin Impact?

A8: Please uninstall the previous beta test files first.


Q9: When launching Genshin, I receive the following alerts:

1. The application cannot start correctly (0xc000007b). Click OK to close  this application.

2. The program can't start because MSVCP140.dll cannot be found. Try  reinstalling the program to fix this problem.

A9: Please look for vcredist2013_x64.exe in your launcher installation  directory. Double-click it to begin installing.

Then go to the Microsoft official website to download and install the  latest VC_redist.x64.exe, and restart the game.


Q10: The installation process was blocked by an anti-virus program or a  similar pop-up notice:

A10: If a virus blocker screen appears during the installation process,  please click "Trust," "Permit," or whatever similar term  appears, or quit the virus software.


Q11: Clicking the launcher produces no response.

A11: Download and install the latest VC_redist.x64.exe as stated in A9.

If you have followed the above instructions but are still unable to solve  the issues you have, please check if you are using a discrete graphics card  and an integrated graphics card simultaneously. If you are, disable your  integrated graphics card before restarting the launcher. If not, please  contact our customer service independently at: genshin_cs@mihoyo.com



Common Gameplay Questions


Q1: Does the PC version of Genshin Impact support MacOS systems?

A1: For now, it does not.


Q2: Does the PC version of Genshin Impact support Xbox/PS4 controllers?  What do I do if I am unable to change my settings after connecting the  controller?

A2: At present, the PC version of Genshin Impact supports the use of PS4 and Xbox One/Elite controllers. We will continue to optimize the controller  experience and compatibility. Please be patient with us, Travelers!

If connecting the controller renders you unable to change settings,  please go to Settings > Control Panel > Devices and Printers, and check  if there is a clash in your virtual controller inputs.


Q3: Does the PC version support emulators?

A3: No, it does not.


Q4: What do I do if the game lags?

A4: First, check if your system settings are compatible with our system  requirements (see the specifications section at the top of this FAQ). Next,  you can also click on Settings in the Paimon Menu, and lower your graphics  quality as needed to increase overall performance.


Q5: What if I am unable to download/update the game?

A5: First ensure that your system has enough disk space to install  Genshin Impact. Next, we recommend that you use a stable internet connection  with sufficient bandwidth to download Genshin Impact, as its game files are  quite large.


Q6: Why does the game crash for no reason?

A6: Crashes occur for many reasons. The development team is already  investigating the various possible reasons. We suggest that you switch to  using a discrete graphics card before restarting the game.

How to switch to using a discrete graphics card:

1. NVIDIA Graphics Card

Right click a blank space on your desktop > Select NVIDIA Control  Panel > 3D Settings > Manage 3D Settings > Program Settings >  Choose the program you want to customize > Select Genshin Impact in the  drop down menu.

> In the second drop-down menu, select the program's preferred  graphics processor.

2. AMD Discrete Graphics Card

Right click a blank space on your desktop > Select Radeon Settings  > Preferences > Additional Settings > Power > Switchable Graphics  Application Settings (or: Graphics Card Properties > Graphics Card  Performance > AMD Radeon Dual Graphics > Use AMD Radeon Dual Graphics)

> Select Genshin Impact from the program list.

(If the game is not in the list, click "Add Program", and  select the Genshin Impact executable file (.exe) in its installation  directory.)

> In the "Graphics Card Settings" column, set "High  Performance" or "Highest Performance" to the game.


Q7: The client crashes several times during the game.

A7: It could be affected by other software in the background. After confirming that your device configuration meets the minimum requirements, please try to restart the computer before opening the client. If you still experience crashes, please contact customer service.

subject: Genshin Impact - Response to Script, Plug-In, and Third-Party Software Issues
content:
Dear Travelers:

Our developers have recently become aware that some Travelers have been using scripts, plug-ins, and other third-party software in-game, as well as sharing these within the player community.

As a result, for accounts that demonstrate the following violations, our developers will be taking measures including but not limited to warnings and account suspensions.


1. Any account using scripts or other third-party software to exploit the game

2. Any account using plug-ins, scripts, or other third-party software to achieve artificial in-game progress

3. Any account obtained through account selling/exchanging

(Please note: it is impossible to guarantee that an account obtained through account selling/exchanging has not made previous use of plug-ins, scripts, or other third-party software.)


Accounts that have been created legitimately by Travelers will not be suspended. If Travelers have not engaged in illegitimate behavior but discover an account status error, please contact our Customer Service team at the following address: genshin_cs@mihoyo.com


To ensure that Travelers have access to secure and stable gameplay, our developers are dedicated to providing a gaming environment that is both friendly and fair.

Our developers will take proportionate actions against those using illegal software and processes to affect the fairness of the game without exception. We hope that Travelers will respect the principles of fair, honest, and wholesome gaming, hold each other accountable, and help maintain the integrity of the gaming environment.

We encourage Travelers who become aware of any similar usage of third-party tools to report such violations. Travelers can do so via the in-game Feedback page or by contacting our Customer Service team.

subject: "Bough Keeper" — Dainsleif
content:
The confluence between the past and future


The original calamity had been overturned, yet the island in the sky set the earth to burn. Chalk pursues gold, in this time inopportune, the eclipse is swallowed by the crimson moon. The future must atone for bygone mistakes, as the bond familiar falters and breaks— of the same blood, elders and the youth... Such is the cycle of the world, in truth. Dain, what is that strand of blonde hair to you? Someone you must kill? Or the object of your penitence?


—A self-proclaimed prophet
